lead_paragraph: Darrelle Revis, the Jets’ All-Pro cornerback, didn’t arrive at training camp and skipped a conditioning test, but still dominated discussions with word of his holdout.
snippet: Darrelle Revis, the Jets’ All-Pro cornerback, didn’t arrive at training camp and skipped a conditioning test, but still dominated discussions with word of his holdout.

headline.main: Seeking New Deal, Jets’ Revis Is Absent, but a Presence
headline.seo: Seeking New Deal, Jets’ Revis Is Absent, but a Presence
headline.print_headline: WAITING GAMES BEGIN, BUT FOR DIFFERENT ENDS; Seeking New Deal, Revis Is Absent But a Presence
